about.imdevfrom: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Moscow, Russia. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences
about.mycreative: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.
about.ilikespring: I like spring because it's a time of renewal and fresh beginnings
about.ilikepizza: I enjoy pizza, especially with a variety of toppings
about.playcs: I enjoy playing CS2 in my free time, and I'm 10 lvl faceit
about.iwasinarmy: I served in the army, which taught me discipline and teamwork and to appreciate every moment of life
about.ilikecars: I have a passion for cars and my dream it's Tyota GT86

contacts.iminterested: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
